Package com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests

Class VolleyRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests.VolleyRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimpleRequest
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateFriendRequest, CreatePrivateLobbyReq, GetUserProfileRequest, JoinPrivateLobbyReq, LeaveLobbyReq, UpdateStatsRequest, UpdateUser, UserStatsRequest
    public class VolleyRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimpleRequest
    Generic volley request that sends a null object to the given URL using the HTTP request type expecting a JSON object as a response.
